source: IRS Publication 946 / Tax Cuts and Jobs Act of 2017
description: Special depreciation allowance (bonus depreciation) phase-down schedule under TCJA

phase_down_schedule.notes: Bonus depreciation expires unless legislation extends

requirements: MACRS property with recovery period of 20 years or less
Qualified film, television, live theatrical production

election_out.description: Taxpayer may elect out of bonus depreciation for any class of property
election_out.reason: May be beneficial if expecting higher tax rates in future years

interaction_with_itc.description: If ITC is claimed, depreciable basis is reduced by 50% of ITC amount

calculation_example.description: BESS project with 30% ITC and 60% bonus depreciation (2024)
calculation_example.notes: Remaining $340,000 depreciated over remaining 5-year MACRS schedule
